title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO ENTER INTO AND SIGN A MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT (MOA) WITH ACADEMIC INSTITUTIONS FOR THE PARTNERSHIP ON THE TRAINING OF MEDICAL AND ALLIED MEDICAL STUDENTS IN THE HEALTH FACILITIES OF LOS BANOS MUNICIPAL HEALTH OFFICE.
